mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.parent_id AS parentId, p.resources, p.title, p.icon, p.type FROM tb_sys_permission AS p LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_permission AS rp ON rp.permission_id = p.pid LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role AS r ON rp.role_id = r.rid LEFT JOIN tb_sys_user_role AS ur ON r.rid = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{uid}
SELECT p.pid, p.parent_id as parentId, p.resources, p.title, p.icon, p.type FROM tb_sys_permission AS p LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_permission AS rp ON rp.permission_id = p.pid WHERE rp.role_id = #{rid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_sys_permission WHERE parent_id = #{pid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_sys_role_permission WHERE permission_id = #{pid}
